name: JonHuntsman
boldText: I urge Congress to reject this $1.5 trillion tax increase and work on the structural reforms to entitlements & taxes we desperately need.

user.name: Jon Huntsman
user.description: Proud husband and father of seven.  Businessman, former two-term Governor of Utah, former Ambassador to China and Singapore. Follow campaign at @Jon2012HQ

name: JonHuntsman
boldText: Meaningful entitlement reform and revenue-neutral tax reform should be priority #1; tax increases should not make the list.
